tool_description: ++50.000 Radio Stations Worldwide, streams url by country.
name: Radio Stations FM AM API
title: Radio Stations FM AM API

api_list.name: GetAllCountryCodes
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://radio-stations-fm-am-api.p.rapidapi.com/country_codes.json"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "radio-stations-fm-am-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: GetStationsByCountry
api_list.code:

api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://radio-stations-fm-am-api.p.rapidapi.com/{pais}/stations.json"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "radio-stations-fm-am-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
